before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"blubs","text":"Add 10 μl β-mercaptoethanol (β-ME) to 1 ml Buffer RLT or Buffer RLC before use. Buffers with DTT or β-ME can be stored at room temperature for up to 1 month. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj8g5","text":"Add 4 volumes of ethanol (96–100%) to Buffer RPE for a working solution. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fvhb","text":"Dissolve lyophilized DNase I (1500 Kunitz units) in 550 μl of RNase-free water. To avoid loss, do not open the vial. Inject RNase-free water into the vial using an RNase-free needle and syringe. Mix gently by inverting. Do not vortex.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59feo","text":"For long-term storage of DNase I, remove the stock solution from the glass vial and divide it into single-use aliquots. Aliquots can be stored at –15 to –25°C for up to 9 months. Thawed aliquots can be stored at 2–8°C for up to 6 weeks. Note: Do not freeze the aliquots after thawing. Do not vortex the reconstituted DNase I. DNase I is especially sensitive to physical denaturation. Mixing should only be carried out by gently inverting the tube.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":237,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1pn64","text":"This protocol is designed for the extraction of total RNA from filter samples containing phytoplankton. It has been validated with a total of 105 cells. The entire procedure requires approximately 2 hours to complete and can yield a minimum of 2μg of RNA, varying based on the sample concentration. The RNA Integrity Number (RIN) obtained should be above 7.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":144,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

9BC5C8B3589941C88B111B0B7324D63C.name: 2 mL Cryovial tube holding the sample

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"435ie","text":"Retrieve the    from the -80°C freezer, and immediately transfer it to dry ice contained within an ice box for temperature preservation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"90e7i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"sample","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":null,"entityMap":null,"group_guid":"9BC5C8B3589941C88B111B0B7324D63C","guid":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jg1k","text":"Add   RTL buffer to a sterile    Eppendorf tube with three (ea) 2.8 mm ceramic beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"crjsb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"450","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apoet","text":"Using tweezers, securely hold the filter. Next, finely cut it using scissors. Carefully add the cut pieces into the  2 mL tubes from step 2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pmtc","text":"Spin the tubes for   in a mini-centrifuge to ensure all filter pieces are fully immersed in the RLT buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"35fip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bv6v","text":"Place the tubes on dry ice for   (or until frozen) and then thaw quickly (slightly warmer than RT). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b7jfh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"m8og","text":"Immediately, after thawing, disrupt the filters using a TissueLyser for    at the maximum speed (30/s). Note: Wrap the cap of the tube with parafilm to prevent any leakage of lysates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":104,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9eei1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6keam","text":"Spin the tubes for    to ensure all filter pieces are fully immersed in the lysates. Leave the tubes for   at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":105,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c1g67","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"A6A7136EF31511EE94490A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3af4d","text":"Transfer the lysate and filters to a QIAshredder spin column (lilac) placed in a    collection tube. centrifuge for  . Transfer the supernatant of the flow-through to a new 2 mL microcentrifuge tube (not supplied) without disturbing the cell-debris pellet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":81,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":116,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"15n75","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13.000","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4crm3","text":"Add 0.5 volume of Ethanol (96–100%) to the cleared lysate, and mix immediately by pipetting. Do not centrifuge. Proceed immediately to step 10. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"911mt","text":"Transfer the sample (usually 650 μl), with any precipitate, to an RNeasy Mini spin column (pink) in a   collection tube (supplied). Centrifuge for  . Discard the collection tubes and replace them with new ones. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":102,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":147,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"i3bp","text":"Note: Don't load more than   on the column. If the sample is more than   , repeat this step by transferring the rest to the spin column and centrifuge again.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dqk0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":30,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93hb0","text":"Add    Buffer RW1 to the RNeasy spin column. Close the lid gently, and centrifuge for    to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8kl4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"350","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":30,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"u0om","text":"Add    DNase I stock solution (see before start) to    Buffer RDD. Mix by gently inverting the tube. Centrifuge briefly to collect residual liquid from the sides of the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b2efb","text":"Buffer RDD is supplied with the RNAse-Free DNase Set. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"70","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cksg7","text":"Add the DNase I incubation mix (  ) directly to the RNeasy spin column membrane, and place on the benchtop at   for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":110,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":116,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d6eqc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"80","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"30","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvnhe","text":"Add    Buffer RW1 to the RNeasy spin column. Close the lid gently, and centrifuge for    to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"350","error":false,"guid":"D21093D5F31811EE94490A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"350","centrifuge":"10000","duration":30,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D21094F7F31811EE94490A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62i6e","text":"Add    Buffer RPE to the RNeasy spin column. Gently rotate the tube while applying the RPE buffer to the inside of the column walls, rather than directly to the filter, to ensure removal of any residues. Close the lid, and centrifuge for  . Discard the flow-through. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":238,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eaf0j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":30,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}

Gently rotate the tube while applying the RPE buffer to the inside of the column walls, rather than directly to the filter, to ensure removal of any residues.  Close the lid, and centrifuge for  . Discard the collection tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":239,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","centrifuge":"10000","duration":30,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5C760A75F31911EE94490A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5C76099DF31911EE94490A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41c2t","text":"Place the RNeasy spin column in a new 2 ml collection tube. Centrifuge at full speed for   to dry the membrane. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"87ppm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ekv3","text":"Place the RNeasy spin column in a new collection tube (supplied). Add  RNase-free water directly to the center of spin column membrane. Incubate for   at   . Then centrifuge for  to elute the RNA. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":149,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":154,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":178,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"72emq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cug45","text":"Repeat step 18 with another 50 uL. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"agfs9","text":"Quantify and evaluate the quality of the RNA using a NanoDrop spectrophotometer and a Bioanalyzer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
